code: import axios from'axios';import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SignupPage=()=>{const handleSignup=e=>{e.preventDefault();axios.post("".concat(window.location.origin,"/api/auth/sign-up"),{name:e.target.name.value,username:e.target.username.value,email:e.target.email.value,password:e.target.password.value}).then(res=>{console.log('res',res);}).catch(err=>{console.log(err);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"h-full py-[18%]",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-3xl mx-auto w-fit mb-3 text-white",children:"Signup"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"mx-auto w-fit my-auto h-[91%]",onSubmit:handleSignup,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"my-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",className:"bg-slate-200/25 border rounded px-2",placeholder:"Mohan Kumar"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"my-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Username"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"username",className:"bg-slate-200/25 border rounded px-2",placeholder:"mohan_123"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"my-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"email",className:"bg-slate-200/25 border rounded px-2",placeholder:"abc@email.com"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"my-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",name:"password",className:"bg-slate-200/25 border rounded px-2",placeholder:"pass@123"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"bg-amber-300 rounded text-white p-1 ml-auto",children:"Sign Up"})})]})]});};export default SignupPage;
